name: Robots Fight with Chaotic Explosions
description:
WEB VERSION: https://trivial-bros.itch.io/rfwceweb

Welcome to Trivial labs!

============================================================

You Play a robot wielding a rocket launcher with the power to damage enemies and launch itself into the skies!

Alongside you is a loudspeaker, who is able to speak to you and will give advice to you and tell jokes.

Have fun!

=============================================================

This was made for the 7th Brackeys Game jam in One Week!

Controls:

Move Left: A / <--

Move Right: D/ -->

Shoot: Left Click
